page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES I
page.content: Wicket Football _ we have two posts for wickets and another about 10 metres away to run round. One team fields and the other team takes turns at kicking the ball,bowled at the wickets. We run for every bowl. You can be out if a wicket falls or if you are caught. Off Ground Touch _ one person is "on it", the rest are off ground. As you run from one safe place to another you may be caught,then you are "on it" and you have to catch anyone running on the ground. Stuck in the Mud _ this game is played after it has been raining. One person is "on it",they have to push the others into the mud i.e.the parts of the playground which have not dried up. When you have been stuck in the mud you are "on it".
